name: cymulate-web-application-firewall
label: Cymulate Web Application Firewall - BAS
description: The Cymulate Web Application Firewall will validate the configuration, implementation, and efficacy, to ensure that the Web Application Firewall blocks malicious payloads before they get to your Web Application. Technical reports provide analysis of the attacks and actionable mitigation guidance that help security teams to shore up their defenses against web application attacks.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.tooltip: API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified.

operations.title: Get WAF Report Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest Web Application Firewall report results by the environment ID.

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the default environment.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the default environment.

operations.title: Get WAF Site Results
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of the latest Web Application Firewall site results and their IDs.

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest results for the default environment.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest results for the default environment.

operations.title: Get WAF Payload Response
operations.description: Retrieves the Web Application Firewall response data based on the payload ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Payload ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the payload ID whose Web Application Firewall response data is to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the payload ID whose Web Application Firewall response data is to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Technical Report Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest technical report results based on the site ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: SiteID
parameters.description: Specify the site ID whose technical report results is to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the site ID whose technical report results is to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say records starting from the 10th index.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say records starting from the 10th index.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results that this operation should return. The minimum supported value is 1000 and the maximum supported value is 10000.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results that this operation should return. The minimum supported value is 1000 and the maximum supported value is 10000.

operations.title: Launch WAF Assessment
operations.description: Launch a Web Application Firewall assessment based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Sites
parameters.name: sites
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated values of urls. eg: https://example1.com,https://example2.com
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated values of urls. eg: https://example1.com,https://example2.com

parameters.title: Template ID
parameters.name: templateID
parameters.description: Specify the template ID to launch a Web Application Firewall assessment.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the template ID to launch a Web Application Firewall assessment.

parameters.title: Schedule
parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: Specify the datetime of the schedule.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime of the schedule.

parameters.title: Schedule Loop
parameters.name: scheduleLoop
parameters.description: Specify the schedule loop. eg: one-time
parameters.tooltip: Specify the schedule loop. eg: one-time

operations.title: Stop WAF Assessment
operations.description: Stop a Web Application Firewall assessment that is running.

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped.

operations.title: Get WAF Assessment History
operations.description: Retrieves the Web Application Firewall assessment history within the date range provided in the query parameters. If a date range is not provided, the response will retrieve the history from the last 30 days.

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Specify the start date to fetch the Web Application Firewall assessments.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date to fetch the Web Application Firewall assessments.

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Specify the end date to fetch the Web Application Firewall assessments.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date to fetch the Web Application Firewall assessments.

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the results will show data from the Default environment.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the results will show data from the Default environment.
